characteristic.name: Average Voltage
characteristic.description:
The Average Voltage characteristic is used to represent average voltage over a period of time.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to the Voltage characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.voltage}.
Refer to the Time Exponential 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_exponential_8}.
